reviewText: Excellent film. Especially if you have floated this river.
Was better than expected and it pleased my sister!
live hear and thought it was great.this is the best price dvd looked everyware
Was a gift for my daughter.  She loves the Buffalo.  Enjoyed watching.
Beautiful to watch and so educational.

I love this DVD because it takes you through the history and present day Buffalo National River. No it isn't a hollywood style production video or a national geographic documentary but it is just a simple/basic outline of how the Buffalo River began, the history behind the surrounding areas of the Buffalo and how it has evolved over time into the free flowing river that many have come to love. It takes you through rock formations, early settlers, abandoned towns, wildlife, and more to show you exactly how this vast ecosystem interacts with the Buffalo National River.
I highly recommend this if you want a brief outline of the Buffalo River or looking to visit this wonderful area.
The Buffalo River is near my original and family home.  The scenery is dear to my heart and portrayed well in the video.  All that is missing is more fish stories.
I am so glad this film exists; I am so glad so many people worked so hard to save this beautiful river!  The Buffalo is awesome - the film is awesome.
Buffalo Flows does an amazing job of introducing you to the Buffalo National River in 56 minutes.  Nothing however is better than being there.
70 years ago I lived near the Buffalo so this was such a great recording for me to show my family
